description:
Toy Story is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Toy Story franchise, which includes the Pixar animated films Toy Story (1995), Toy Story 2 (1999), Toy Story 3 (2010), Toy Story 4 (2019), and the upcoming Toy Story 5 (2026).
The films involve the adventures of a group of toys, specifically that of a cowboy sheriff toy named Woody and a space ranger toy named Buzz Lightyear, who come to life when they are not in the sight of humans.
name: Toy Story
